author: cziegeler
msg: Refactoring of settings. Move them into a separate, more visible package and remove unused interfaces.
Add new settings helper to make CoreUtil smaller

msg: Fixing MNG-2418: Norwegian translation for maven-site-plugin.

author: trygvis
msg: Fixing MDEP-7: "ClassCastException caused by DefaultArtifact vs. ActiveProjectArtifact"
Patch by Christian Schulte. Changed the patch a bit as the plugin has moved to
Apache since the patch was created.
o Replacing a cast to DefaultArtifact to Artifact.

author: foconer
msg: scp protocol seems to disregard permission config from settings.xml. Changed it to scpexe instead.
